text: Fin Fang Foom is a supervillain that first appeared in 1961 in the #89 issue of Strange Tales. He was created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby. He has the power to super strength, the ability to fly with his wings at supersonic speeds, and can also spew combustible acid mist from his mouth. Fin Fang Foom also made multiple appearances in the Iron Man comics. ==Other websites== *Fin Fang Foom at Marvel.com Category:Marvel Comics supervillains Category:Marvel Comics superheroes
title: Fin Fang Foom
